pageHeader.title: GUID Generator
pageHeader.description: A modern tool for generating time-ordered, 122-bit universally unique identifiers.

advancedOptions.title: Advanced Options
advancedOptions.subtitle: Generate GUIDs based on a reference GUID with optional time offset.
advancedOptions.referenceGuidDescription: Generate GUIDs based on this reference GUID's timestamp
advancedOptions.timeOffsetDescription: Adjust the reference GUID's timestamp (requires reference GUID above)

errors.title: Error
errors.invalidQuantity: Please enter a valid quantity between 1 and 1000
errors.timeOffsetNeedsReference: Time offset can only be used with a reference GUID
errors.invalidTimeOffset: Please enter a valid time offset in milliseconds
errors.copyFailed: Failed to copy to clipboard. Please try again.
